item.title: Searching bash history when it's in multiple files
item.description:
When I look for previous commands that I have ran in bash, I use history | grep COMMAND. That works well when you're history is in one file, but I now save my history in multiple files from each shell and my simple command doesn't work.

With my history files saved …
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins

item.title: History teacher and class discover Boston's own Forest Gump
item.description:
The Briefcase

...they slowly uncovered the life of a man who not only oversaw the liberated Dachau but also found himself a participant in an uncommon number of consequential events throughout Massachusetts and U.S. history. In a way Delaney couldn't have imagined when he first popped open the suitcase …
